comment.body: Same today at Aldi. Some auld lad parked his Lexus SUV across three spots. I told him he was being selfish, and he just laughed and walked off. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
My mother lives in a housing estate near a big shopping centre and I have never seen it so bad as this year, I think it's peaked because amazon is coming soon.
You think people are parking like shitehawks because Amazon are coming? Right.
I think he's suggesting there will be less shitehawks after Amazon.ie launches like they will magically disappear
I've no idea what the fuck he's talking about if I'm honest.
Maybe Super Valu in Killester will be down a few morons cos Amazon is open in Ireland? Doubt it. By the way big shout out to the tall lad doing the car park cos he's an animal.
The worst offender are parents at schools, dunno how Amazon.ie will change it unless they can somehow prime service will deliver kids home
I'd love to see a huge Amazon van deliver kids home from school. Just lash the cunts out of the van and drive on.
But don‚Äôt you know those almost-adult secondary schoolers need to be dropped right at the door
Your child is in your green bin
